name: Tâm Homestay
address: 12/35 Chu Van An Phu Hoi, Huế, Việt Nam
description:
Nằm ở Huế, cách Cầu Tràng Tiền 15 phút đi bộ và Chợ Đông Ba 1.9 km, Tâm Homestay cung cấp chỗ nghỉ có Wi-Fi miễn phí, điều hòa, khu vườn và phòng chờ chung.

Nơi đây còn có phòng tắm riêng với vòi xịt/chậu rửa vệ sinh ở tất cả các căn, cùng đồ vệ sinh cá nhân miễn phí, máy sấy tóc và dép đi trong phòng.

Khuôn viên của nhà nghỉ B&B có sân hiên và du khách có thể đi xe đạp ở khu vực gần đó.

Tâm Homestay cách Bảo tàng Museum of Royal Antiquities 2.9 km và Tử Cấm Thành 4 km. Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay quốc tế Phú Bài, cách chỗ nghỉ 13 km, đồng thời chỗ nghỉ có cung cấp dịch vụ đưa đón sân bay mất phí.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: My absolute favourite accommodation in my whole Vietnam trip💖 ! The host family are the sweetest people and always welcomed me back with a delicious tea and fruit. The whole property was spotlessly clean and I felt very welcomed there. I arrived off the overnight train from Hanoi and was feeling quite sick - they allowed me to check in earlier to my room where I was able to rest and recover in my lovely room. I booked a room with a very peaceful and beautiful balcony - recommend! I would 100% go back and highly rate this hidden gem to anyone wanting a calm and welcoming stay in Hue! Thank you so much :)

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công (2 Người Lớn + 1 Trẻ Em)

Je recommande vivement!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Unbelievable value for money!! We got an apartment style room with a balcony, dining area, kitchenette, separate bathroom and bedroom. Everything was spotlessly clean and beautifully decorated. Bed was so comfortable and shower was hot with good pressure. Location was perfect - walkable to many restaurants. We rented a bike for a reasonable price and also organised to do the hai van pass. The staff were exceptionally helpful and breakfast was delicious and had good choice. Would highly recommend coming to Hue even just to stay here!

review.rating: Beautiful neat, tidy and clean stay with wonderful host

review.comment_positive: It was more than what we expected. Very clean and neat room. Showers were hot. The host was so lovely and gave us a map of area and recommendations for food which we LOVED the food in both restaurants, very authentic Hue food. Would highly recommend here to anyone visiting Hue. Did not notice any other people staying as everyone was very quiet and respectful of this lovely home.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Odwiedziliśmy obiekt Tam homestay podczas mojej podróży do Wietnamu i był to niesamowity pobyt! Gospodarz był niezwykle uprzejmy i troskliwy, zawsze gotowy pomóc i udzielić wskazówek na temat lokalnych atrakcji. Pokoje były czyste i przytulne, a śniadania serwowane przez gospodarza były pyszne i obfite. Atmosfera w Tam homestay była bardzo przyjazna i ciepła, czuliśmy się jak w domu z dala od domu. Gorąco polecamy ten obiekt każdemu, kto szuka autentycznego doświadczenia wietnamskiej gościnności!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
Phòng Deluxe (2 Người lớn + 1 Trẻ em)
review.comment_positive: Die Unterkunft ist sehr zu empfehlen. Zunächst sind die Gastgeber super freundlich, hilfsbereit und warmherzig. Sie haben den Aufenthalt zu etwas sehr besonderem gemacht. Sie sind sehr aufmerksam und konnten bei jeder Frage helfen. Unser Zimmer war sehr sauber und gut ausgestattet. Äußerst positiv aufgefallen ist mir zum Beispiel, dass man pro Person zwei Handtücher hatte und diese nach der ersten Nacht ausgetauscht wurden. Außerdem hatte man Wasserflaschen auf dem Zimmer, die ebenfalls nachgefüllt wurden. Die Betten sind sehr gemütlich. Das Frühstück war sehr lecker und uns wurde sogar wegen der frühen Abreise ein kleines Frühstück to Go angeboten. Auch die Lage ist sehr gut. Man ist mitten im Geschehen, aber es ist sehr ruhig auf Grund der „Innenhof mäßigen“ Lage.

review.comment_positive:
Nos encantó la habitación, la ubicación, el anfitrión y el desayuno. Todo fue perfecto.
La habitación limpia y espaciosa. El baño tiene de todo.
Está ubicado a unos pasos de la walking street. Para visitar la ciudadela alquilamos una moto por 150.000 dong al día.
El dueño encantador. Te informa de lo que puedes hacer. Nos ofreció traslado desde el aeropuerto, y nos puso en contacto con una agencia para hacer la Hai Van Pass.
El desayuno muy bueno. Tienes varias opciones dónde elegir.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: This was by far the best accomodation in the whole Vietnam to me! Such a zen for very affordable price. The owner is attentive, provides a lot of information, and foremost treats you like you were his family. My room was very nice, clean, reasonably big, and calm. The whole place feels really relaxing and pure. I really enjoyed that I could choose from various types of breakfasts, it was always delicious. If I am ever back in Huế, I will surely stay here again!
review.comment_negative: I cannot remind of anything I would point out as a negative, which is rather unusual with me.

review.rating: Wir buchen hier bestimmt nicht mehr
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
der Vermieter hat sich am Anfang sehr bemüht wurde dann aber immer aufdringlicher in seiner Art. wir wurden mit kaltem Tee und kaltem Essen begrüßt. Erst nach dem wir auf das Zimmer geführt wurden, wurde uns erklärt, dass unser gebuchtes Zimmer mit Balkon ein Abflussproblem hat und wir in diesem Fensterlosen Verlies übernachten müssen. Die zweite gebuchte Nacht erhalten wir das gewünschte Zimmer. Da uns schon die ganze Zeit kalt war wollten wir nur noch ein warmes Essen. Seine Empfehlung war ein offenes Restaurant.
Wir haben uns auf Grund der Wetterlage und dem Zimmerloch entschieden wieder abzureisen.
Für das falsche nicht benutze Zimmer hat er aber den vollen Preis berechnet.
Zu guter letzt haben wir festgestellt, beim Abholen unseres Gepäcks aus dem Zimmer, dass der Vermieter das abgeschlossene Zimmer ohne unsere Zustimmung betreten hat, um seine Teller abzuholen.
Die körperlich aufdringliche Art ist in Vietnam nicht ungewöhnlich, doch diese Art von Geldgier und Nachschnüffeln stößt bei uns unangenehm auf.
Im Gegensatz zu den vorigen Bewertungen lief es bei uns ganz anders.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Il signor Chuong, proprietario della homestay, ci ha accolto come fossimo suoi fratelli e si è creato un bellissimo rapporto di amicizia. Siamo stati coccolati per tutto il soggiorno di 4 notti, ha organizzato per noi la visita privata di tutti i monumenti intorno a Hue, alcuni di essi difficili da individuare se non si è accompagnati. Ad ogni rientro pomeridiano era pronta per noi una bibita fresca e seguivano due chiacchiere a commentare le bellezze dei luoghi visitati. Che altro dire? Se non andate di corsa fermatevi qui qualche giorno, le stanze (a parte la nostra) sono ben arredate e spaziose, tutte comunque pulitissime e la struttura si trova nella zona sicuramente più carina per trovare locali dove mangiare e fare shopping. Grazie Chuong!
review.comment_negative: La nostra stanza (credo l'unica) non aveva finestre ed era veramente troppo piccola per 2 persone. Purtroppo sul sito non era evidenziata questa caratteristica (a mio avviso importante da sapere), semmai al momento della prenotazione chiedete.

review.room_type: Căn Hộ Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Dudo que haya otro sitio con mejor calidad-precio en Hué que Tâm Homestay. La familia que lo regenta es extremadamente amable, te sirven té siempre que te sientas en la entrada, te ayudan en lo que pueden -quizas lo peor es comunicarte con ellos en inglés- y las habitaciones están muy limpias y son bastantes grandes. Recomiendo coger el apartamento. El desayuno está bien y la localización es perfecta, a treinta segundos del centro pero sin el ruido de las calles principales. Mejor elección, imposible.

review.comment_positive:
We've stayed in a good few places in Vietnam during our 1 month trip in the country and this has to best place we've stayed in. First of all really good value for money. Great and cute homestay in Hue. The owner and his family were so lovely and welcoming. The owner suggested good places for us to eat.


We got the room with separate living room/kitchen area which was really handy. There was a table, small cooker, utensils and fridge if you wanted to make something. The bedroom part itself was very cosy and comfortable. 

The homestay was in a really good area. The area was very lively with both locals and tourist, very close to restaurants, bars and shops although it was close to bars it was very quite as the accommodation was by the alleyway.

If you book with Tâm Homestay I would highly suggest booking the room with the separate living/kitchen area. We will definitely be coming to stay here again if we ever come back to Hue!

review.rating: Best stay in Vietnam- beautiful and clean rooms with perfect location.
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công (2 Người Lớn + 1 Trẻ Em)
review.comment_positive: Wow! It felt like a 5 star hotel- the staff were always friendly and helpful. A cup of tea is provided as soon as you step back in. The rooms were big and spacious as well as very clean. We loved the balcony to have a cup of tea and coffee. Great location for walking around and restaurants; we were in a small street that was quiet. I would come to Hue again just to be able to stay here.

review.rating: Wir können die Unterkunft nur jedem empfehlen, der nach Hue reist.

review.comment_positive: Wir wurden mit Tee & Obst begrüßt und wurden sehr herzlich von der Familie Tam aufgenommen. Uns wurde geholfen, wenn’s nötig war und wir haben uns in Tam Homestay sehr wohl gefühlt.

review.rating: Vô cùng tuyệt vời khi được lưu trú ở Tâm Homestay!
review.room_type: Căn Hộ Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Thật may mắn và tuyệt vời khi được lưu trú những ngày ở Huế tại Tâm homestay... Ấn tượng và thật cảm kích trước sự chu đáo và vô cùng dễ thương của anh Chương (chủ homestay) và gia đình của anh, cả nhà đã "chăm sóc tinh thần" cho mình bằng không gian căn phòng xinh đẹp, sạch sẽ, đầy đủ tiện nghi, chiếc giường êm ái cùng những quyển sách hay của Sư ông Làng Mai, mọi chi tiết decor ở home đều được anh Chương cẩn thận chăm chút...khi cần không gian yên tĩnh với gió trời thì mình ra ban công, pha ly trà và ngồi đọc sách. Ở Tâm homestay có dịch vụ đón đưa ra sân bay và cho thuê xe máy, thế nên chuyến đi của mình rất thuận lợi về mặt phương tiện di chuyển và không phải mất nhiều thời gian. Khi mình cần hỗ trợ gì thì anh đều nhiệt tình giúp đỡ!
Mình cảm thấy như được ở nhà, và thật sự thoải mái thư giãn khi ở đây. Ngày đầu tiên đến anh Chương ra tận ngõ để đón và giúp mình xách hành lý, chu đáo mời mình ly trà gừng và tận tình chỉ dẫn cho mình những địa điểm ăn uống tham quan. Khi mình rời homestay đi chơi thì anh và con trai của anh đều hỏi thăm và giúp mình dẫn xe...ngày mình về lại Saigon thì chị nhà còn giúp mình chạy đi mua bánh bột lọc. Cảm ơn gia đình anh Chương rất nhiều!!!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công

review.rating: THE best place to stay in HUÉ! - a personable, cozy homestay
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: What an excellent place to stay in Hué! The location is perfect, being just a brief walk or ride from the imperial city and with plenty of restaurants less than a 2 minute walk away. The homestay is cute and extremely clean with comfortable rooms that hit the spot and are well decorated. It is the hospitality though that puts Tam Homestay over the top. It is truly exceptional. Each day, upon your return, you almost feel as if you are coming "home" as your excellent and genuinely kind hosts will greet you and offer you a cup of tea. They are right there to assist in offering umbrellas, restaurant recommendations, transportation options and more. We had a delightful time in Tam homestay and would ABSOLUTELY stay again. Cannot recommend highly enough. You will enjoy it!

The owner was very nice, polite and helpful (!), even after we left he helped us immediately with something we needed. The booked us tickets for sleeping bus so we didn’t need to worry about it. The homestay was very clean! For sure I would return to this homestay. 

Είναι όντως πολύ καλή φάση, το συνιστώ ανεπιφύλακτα. Προσοχή όμως στο μονοήμερο τουρ στα αρχαία της πόλης. Ίσως θέλει λίγο ψάξιμο και αλλού. το τουρ που μας πρότεινε δεν ήταν φοβερό αλλά ίσως έφταιγε και η άπειρη καταρρακτώδης βροχή…

review.comment_positive: It was very central and close to good restaurants and full of life at night. The rooms were very clean and well decorated, very close to the photos shown in Booking.com. We rented a scooter from this place, 150.000 Dong (can be found a little cheaper in the streets, but with older scooters). We could leave our luggage there after checkout, as our train was at night. They always brought us cold delicious tea when we came back to the reception. Friendly and attentive owners!

review.rating: Nice stay with minor easily avoidable issues

review.comment_negative: Although I booked Deluxe Queen Room, the size of the room was ridiculously small. There was some communication issue regarding the city tour price he offered which could have been easily avoided, had he published the pricing or write it down. Lastly, not accepting credit cards and saying so at the last minute is a hassle. Overall a nice stay, but easily could have been better.

review.comment_positive: Das schönste Homestay welches wir auf unserer Vietnamreise hatten. Sauber und komfortabel, trotz der zentralen Lage sehr ruhig. Wir hatten ein Zimmer mit Balkon und toller Aussicht. Tam war sehr nett und spricht gut Englisch, außerdem hat er die Zimmer bzw. das Homestay sehr schön eingerichtet/dekoriert. Das Frühstück war auch sehr lecker!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Tâm Homestay is the perfect place and everything we could have hoped for!! Perfect location (very central with a lot in walking distance, but in a side alley so quiet at night), the most lovely host ever (extremely friendly, helpful and accommodating), delicious food (great choices for breakfast, welcome tea and fruit, and again a kind tea while waiting before we had to leave), very clean and spacious room, equipped with the special love for detail, and also a motorcycle for rent, which allowed us to explore the whole city. We wished we could have stayed longer! Thank you again for everything.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe (2 Người lớn + 1 Trẻ em)

review.comment_positive:
Hôte extrêmement prévenant et attentionné ! Il veille réellement au bien être des résidents par de petites attentions (ex: suite à une forte pluie nos chaussures ont été séchées sans que nous le demandions et étaient prêtes pour repartir le lendemain, prêt de parapluie, trouve un moyen de transport pour l'aéroport, etc... ). 
Petit déjeuner délicieux et emplacement proche de bons petits restos. 
Chambre spacieuse et très propre. 
Nous garderons un excellent souvenir de notre séjour à Hué dans cet établissement proche de la perfection.

De gastheer is zeer vriendelijk. We werden zeer prettig ontvangen en kregen meteen de plekjes te zien waar we het beste konden eten. 
De kamer was netjes en iedere dag werd deze schoon gemaakt en kregen we nieuwe handdoeken. 
De locatie is super fijn. De Homestay ligt in een smaller steegje waardoor je ‘s nachts geen last hebt van het lawaai van de straat.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: L'appartement est incroyable. Très joli, décoré avec beaucoup de goût. L'hôte est vraiment adorable, il fait tout pour que l'on se sente bien.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe (2 Người lớn + 1 Trẻ em)
review.comment_positive: Gentillesse et serviabilité du propriétaire (thé pour l'accueil, location de scooters, organisation d'un trajet en bus Hué/Hoi An...) chambre propre, bon petit-déjeuner, hôtel bien placé (citadelle accessible à pied 30min environ, proche des restaurants/bars, tout en restant au calme)
review.comment_negative: Pas de fenêtre donnant sur l'extérieur (pour une chambre qui ne donnait pas côté impasse)

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Excellent hospitality and very clean place. Location is good, in the centre, so everything is close. Restaurant they recommended had so delicious food! 10 points to Tam Homestay!

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công (2 Người Lớn + 1 Trẻ Em)
review.comment_positive:
Sehr Herzlicher Empfang mit Willkommens Getränke und einem Lächeln. 
Wir haben uns hier sehr wohl und aufgehoben Gefühlt. Es war eins der Besten Homestay in dem wir je waren. 
Würden jederzeit wieder zurück kommen. 
Zimmer war sehr sauber und bequem mit einer netten Atmosphäre. Der Balkon war der Hammer.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Πολύ καλή η επικοινωνία και η υποδοχή στο κατάλυμα..Ο Tam μας υποδέχτηκε με τοπικά προϊόντα (τσάι και φρούτα) και μας βοήθησε πλήρως για το πώς να κινηθούμε στην πόλη.Το δωμάτιο είναι πολύ καθαρό και έχει ωραία διακόσμηση,όλα είναι από bamboo..Την επόμενη μέρα νοικιάσαμε το μηχανάκι του πολύ οικονομικά και γυρίσαμε στην πόλη.Μας πήγε και στο αεροδρόμιο,πολύ πιο φθηνά από ταξί ή grab..Είναι ο τέλειο οικοδεσπότης.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công (2 Người Lớn + 1 Trẻ Em)

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen

review.comment_positive:
Très très propre, de l'accueil au dernier étage 👍, les chambres étaient faites tous les jours avec changement de serviettes.
Le lit moelleux. La douche avait un bon débit et était bien chaude.
Situé dans une impasse, c'était très calme.
Les propriétaires sont aux petits soins avec tous leurs clients. Leur Fils qui travaille avec eux m'a emmené sur sa moto dans endroit où je voulais aller alors que j'étais prête à appeler un moto taxi. Très proche du pont qui mène au marché.

We arrived early (after getting an overnight train from Ninh Binh) so was too early to check in, but he let us use his bathroom to get ready before our day tour we had booked and he kept our baggage for us.

The value for money at this place is insane!

review.rating: So very happy we chose to stay at Tam Homestay
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The house and rooms are beautiful, the breakfast offered was very good and the beds are so very comfy. This place is set back a little off the main street so no noise can be heard to disturb you in any way. Many many shops and restaurants are within walking distance as well as Dong Ba market. You are welcomed with drinks everyday, fresh fruit is provided in your room on arrival and some free waters are also offered too. Any trip can be arranged from the property. We cannot thank the host Cheung and his family enough for taking the time to ensure we had the best time in Hue.

The room was very comfortable and very clean.
The breakfast in the morning was very tasty.
Great location, near the bustling part of town but set back from the main road so noise is no issue at night.
I highly recommend you stay here when in Hue!

review.comment_positive: The homestay was very clean and I felt completely comfortable and safe as a solo female traveller. The owner of the property is very kind and goes above and beyond to make your stay comfortable. There is always refreshments and a cold drink as you enter. The property is right near restaurants and cafes. It’s down a small alley way/ residential road but it is completely safe to walk at night. The room is fully equipped with everything you need. The house is very clean and polished. I have stayed in a lot of 5* hotels and Tam Homestay is a 5* service. The property is beautifully decorated.

The homestay is in a little alley way just off the main tourist street, which means everything is very accessible.

One of the best homestays were we stayed in Vietnam so far!

It started with a very warm welcoming by the owner with tea and fruits. He helped us planning our trip in Hué. The family was super friendly and provided us every morning with delicious breakfast. 

Our room was very spacious and spotless clean. We had a cosy living room with a little kitchen, a room with a comfortable big bed and place to store our clothes, a nice terrace, bathroom,...

Last but not least, the homestay has a good location (central, but in a quiet street). We would definitely recommend this place!

review.rating: Five star service & a great place to stay
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
Location: Right in the center close to a number of nice restaurants and bars, but on a quiet back street so it’s nice and quiet. 

Room & Facilities: Exactly as pictured. Very clean. Good AC. Comfortable bed. Great water pressure in the shower with warm water. Good wifi. Quiet. The owners put in lots of thoughtful extra touches like little flowers dotted around the room. Tastefully decorated and had everything we needed like a fridge, drinking water, and a hairdryer. 

Hosts: Incredibly kind and welcoming family. They helped us with everything like booking transport and tours. They went over and above to help us and we’re really quick to respond to us via the chat function which we really appreciated. They also offered us thoughtful things like cold water and fresh fruit on arrival, they also sent us on a tour but made sure they sent with us hats, water and snacks. 

Conclusion: Excellent service, great facilities, perfect location. We’d happily stay again and highly recommend staying here!

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công (2 Người Lớn + 1 Trẻ Em)

review.rating: Séjour et accueil  parfait dans ce petit hôtel familial.
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công (2 Người Lớn + 1 Trẻ Em)
review.comment_positive:
Emplacement idéal dans une ruelle. Pendant la fête du Têt  c'était indispensable pour le bruit. 
L'accueil chaleureux du propriétaire qui nous a préparé une spécialité, des bananes et du thé quand nous sommes arrivés. 
Chambre parfaite avec un balcon. Grande salle de bains.
Je conseille ce petit hôtel familial.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
Chưa bao giờ mình viết bài đánh giá chỗ nghỉ du lịch nhiều như này, nhưng vì mọi trải nghiệm đều rất tuyệt nên cần kể cho mọi người
Ban đầu mình đặt 2 phòng cho 2 gái + 1 nam - 4 ngày 3 đêm, nhưng lúc gần đi sát ngày thì đột xuất tăng thêm 1 bạn nữ, mình đã liên hệ Homestay để nhờ trợ giúp, chú chủ Homestay đã ưu đãi cho bạn tăng thêm ở ghép phòng với phòng của 2 bạn nữ ban đầu (do ngày đầu đã hết phòng trống), đêm ở ghép miễn phí Chú chủ Homestay ko tính thêm tiền, 2 đêm còn lại có phòng trống nên 1 bạn nữ tách ra ở riêng để thoải mái hơn.
- Các phòng đều sạch, đẹp, tiện nghi như hình ảnh đăng
- Cô chú chủ Homestay giới thiệu các chỗ chơi, ăn uống rất nhiều và ngon
- Homestay nằm ở trong ngõ của khu phố đi bộ đêm nên vừa tiện lợi mà ko bị ảnh hưởng ồn ào như ngoài mặt đường
Đặc biệt chuyến đi thì 1 bạn nam bên mình bị ốm, thỉnh thoảng sốt. Cô chú chủ Homestay đã quan tâm bạn ấy cực kỳ luôn, đặc cách lắp thêm tivi cho riêng phòng bạn ấy nằm để lúc bạn ấy mệt không đi đâu thì có tivi xem giải trí, và mỗi ngày đều được Cô Chú chủ Homestay pha trà gừng + nước cam + đưa Dầu gió cho bạn ấy luôn (tất cả đều ko tính thêm phí gì đâu nhé)
Nói chung mọi thứ đều tuyệt vời. Mình đã có chuyến đi Huế trọn vẹn.
Có dịp quay lại Huế hay có người quen đi Huế, mình nhất định sẽ giới thiệu Homestay này với họ.

review.rating: Attentive hospitality in the centre of Hue
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Really large and comfortable room in the centre of Hue – highly recommend being here between Friday to Sunday to take advantage of the walking street on the doorstep. Very lively, but occasionally noisy as a result of this. Extremely attentive and very (very) present staff at this homestay – they went above and beyond with greetings, complimentary tea & fruit, and breakfasts.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Chú chủ homestay rất chu đáo, hỏi thăm từ trước ngày nhận phòng. Chú nhiệt tình đưa bản đồ rồi giới thiệu những chỗ ăn ngon, những nơi nổi tiếng nên ghé qua. Hôm ăn ốc về chú còn pha cho 2 ly trà nóng bảo uống cho ấm bụng. Cô chú và bạn nam đều rất chu đáo, nhiệt tình. Phòng đẹp, sạch sẽ cực kỳ. Thích nhất là mỗi phòng có tên riêng, phòng mình decor chi tiết nhỏ cũng đẹp vì chủ yếu dùng tre… 
Giặt là đồ bị sát giờ tàu chạy, chú cũng lái xe ra ga để kịp đưa cho mình. Homestay đầu ngõ là phố đi bộ cuối tuần, đi chỗ nào cũng tiện vì các điểm mình thấy cũng khá gần, vài phút đi xe máy là đến. Lần đầu mình rate 10 cho một homestay vì ưng ý từ ngày đến cho đến lúc rời đi. Cảm ơn cô chú rất nhiều ạ. Nếu có cơ hội quay lại Huế, chắc chắn cháu sẽ ghé lại Tâm homestay ❤️

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen

review.rating: Ubicación y descanso bien. Host mal.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: La ubicación está bien, en una zona con muchos restaurantes. Hacen lavandería por 25.000 dongs el kilo. La habitación era enorme y estaba muy limpia. El colchón era súper cómodo.
review.comment_negative: El host es entre pesado, cotilla e interesado. Piensa que el europeo es un billete con patas, aunque eso en Hue es muy común. Al principio quería saber nuestros planes, pero era para vendernos excursiones, transporte y de todo… no quería ni que usáramos Grab. Te ofrecen té de manera insistente cada vez que entras por la puerta. Es un poco invasivo, ya que cuando vuelves de hacer cosas lo que quieres es irte a la habitación a descansar. La lavandería te la devuelven con prendas aún húmedas y sin planchar. De hecho entraron a dejar el cesto a la habitación sin nuestro consentimiento, y la ropa nos la entregaron en recepción cuando la pedimos. Pero lo peor de todo (aunque sea un mínimo gasto para nosotros) es que cuando fuimos a recoger las mochilas nos cobraron 3 botellas de agua del “minibar”. ¿Qué minibar? Tenían 2 botellas de agua en la habitación y 4 en la nevera, y en ningún lado anunciaba el precio del agua de la nevera… evidentemente a 40 grados cogimos las frías. Pero repito, en ningún sitio ponía precio ni nada, y un minibar no se compone jamás de SOLO agua. Además en otros comentarios hemos visto que a gente a la que ayudó con excursiones y transporte, les regaló agua para el camino. Por lo que intuyo y noto que nos cobró el agua porque por narices nos quería sacar algo extra.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe (2 Người lớn + 1 Trẻ em)
review.comment_positive: I really enjoyed meeting the host and his family who were always willing to provide some extra drinks and invited us to sit and chat while waiting for the tour guides. The housing was extremely beautiful inside and combined Vietnamese with modern artistic touches.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Great host. He was very friendly and helpful. Had some great tips to visit the city and lent me a motorbike for a reasonable fee. The location was great, with a lot of restaurants, cafés and bars around. The homestay was in a small alley away from the street so despite the central location the room was very quiet.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The owner is super nice and friendly!! They try their best to help you with anything and always greeted me with some tea and/or snacks. The room itself was nicely decorated and very clean. For each morning you get to choose from a breakfast list which has good and tasty options.
review.comment_negative: The room I stayed in has a windows overlooking a wall so there was no natural light. Although you can't hear noises from the outside, you can clearly here what's going on at the entrance hall and corridor.

review.rating: Sentirsi a casa in quel di Hue

review.comment_positive: La stanza era pulitissima e bella, il proprietario simpaticissimo ci ha sempre aspettato con un the a dello zenzero in ingresso, colazione super. Grazie dai tuoi amici italiani

Homestay ở vị trí trung tâm, rất thuận tiện di chuyển đến các địa điểm tham quan. Quanh homestay cũng có nhiều quán ăn ngon và gần cả 1 cửa hàng thuê Việt phục đẹp & rẻ nữa.
Cô chú chủ homestay siêu thân thiên, giới thiệu cho mình nhiều chỗ ăn chơi, lúc nào đi đâu về cũng có nước mát cho bọn mình uống.

review.comment_positive: Decisamente il posto più accogliente dove abbiamo soggiornato nel nostro viaggio in Vietnam. Peccato esserci fermati così poco. Speriamo di tornare. Ti senti subito il benvenuto al tuo arrivo i proprietari sono incredibilmente gentili e ti fanno sentire a casa. Te fresco ad aspettarci al rientro delle uscite. Ottimi consigli su dove mangiare e cosa vedere ed è piacevolissimo fermarsi a fare quattro chiacchiere. Tutto incredibilmente pulito e tranquillo. Posizione ottima. Speriamo di tornarci una prossima volta, e fermarci qualche giorno in più.

review.comment_positive: stayed at Tam homestay for three nights last week.first night stayed at deluxe double room with balcony,second and third night should stay at another room,but the host asked me if i can stay three night at the same room,cuz he said the price would be the same,i agreed with him.so this review is for deluxe double room with balcony.the room is clean,like home,the host stay with us,the living room is big,it has a kitchen,a bathroom and a balcony.the host,Tam is friendly and nice,will prepare drinks for you when you go back from outside.i booked a traditional singing on Huong River ticket from him, also booked one day private car tour and minibus to Hoi An(with tour), price are reasonable and cheaper than others.the location of the homestay is great,close to many eateries and shops,also close to walking street area and perfume river.the homestay is very quiet ,so you will have very good sleep every night. about breakfast ,there are many options to choose,but all are vegetarian food( some with eggs). will stay here again,Tam homestay is the best choice in Hue.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Best place to stay in Hue, Tam was very helpful from the moment we landed until we left.  I became unwell overnight and Tam made the effort of providing me and my girlfriend food and water to make sure I was okay. he even made sure I got to my next location taken my luggage to it and texting me the next evening to see how I was which was very nice of him. If you get the chance to stay in Hue stay here would highly recommend it.

review.rating: Location, value, comfort, hosts....everything was excellent.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: This place is a gem. It has a great location right in the heart of Hue but down a quiet alley.  It was a short walk to a bunch of restaurants; a couple of which the host provided us names of. We had a 1 bedroom with a kitchenette, table and balcony. The AC worked great in the bedroom. The hosts go out of their way to make you feel special. We were greeted with tea and fruit on arrival and thereafter every time we returned from sightseeing. We stayed for 3 nights and we always looked forward to coming back at the end of the day. The WIFI was great as well. Breakfast was good as well.
review.comment_negative: We loved the place. It does get a bit warm in the kitchen/table area but then you appreciate the coolness of the bedroom that much more. Cash only.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Todo fue estupendo!! Los dueños muy amables y atentos, todo muy limpio y muy bien situado. Nos facilitaron nuestra estancia en Hue y se encargaron de coger los siguientes traslados!!  Todo excelente!!

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công (2 Người Lớn + 1 Trẻ Em)
review.comment_positive:
Exceptional! We had such a warm and friendly welcome here, the hospitality was outstanding.
Communication was excellent for help with our arrival by train and and getting to the Homestay. As it's down an alleyway, cars cannot go down the last few meters, so we were met at the street to help with our luggage.
The room was very spacious with beautiful terrace, plenty of room for 3 of us. Location was excellent, very close to night walking street with bars and restaurants but quiet and when we were back in our room.
Breakfast was provided for a very small extra charge and we could choose the items we wanted to eat and drink.
We could not fault anything here, everything was spotlessly clean, it's in a great location but it felt homely and serene and the father and son hosts go out of their way to make you feel welcome!
We can definitely recommend staying here when in Hue!

You can confirm your choice and time of breakfast the day prior, everything was well prepared. Long story short; highly recommend staying here during visit to Hue.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: The owner of the Homestay, Mr. Chuong, is very friendly and welcoming. Each time that I got back from being out in the day, he would make a different drink to welcome me back. I stayed in the Deluxe Double Room with Balcony, which looks just like an apartment that's suitable for solo travelers or couples and is equipped with a mini kitchen, as well as a low bamboo table where guests can sit on the floor. The homestay is clean with beautiful decor. Footwear has to be removed before entering. However, all your valuables should be kept in the room which can be locked, as the living room area can be accessed through a latched bamboo door. Will come back to stay again when I'm back in Hue!
review.comment_negative: Wished that the access to the apartment can be locked. As a female solo traveler, this may be a downside to its security. The address on Google Maps is also not accurate, but there were friendly locals in the vicinity to help me find the Homestay.

review.comment_positive: You have to stay here if you are coming to Hue! The service was probably the best we have ever had, the family are so warm, kind and accommodating. We arrived early in the morning after a long night of travelling and the owner upgraded us to a deluxe room for free so we could lie down right away. They also run a laundry service so you can just drop your clothes off at reception and pick them up the next day. The free breakfast is lovely & the location is perfect, surrounded by bars and restaurants. The beds/rooms in both the deluxe and standard suites are fantastic, so comfy! Finally a proper duvet :) I can’t think of one thing that would make this stay better - 10/10!

review.rating: homestay with five star service in Hue city
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: stayed here for three nights,when checked in,the host Tam welcomed me with fresh juice and fruits.the room i booked is big,actually i booked two different room,cuz the room type i preferred only available on the second and third day,so i booked another room on the first day.but the host asked me if i can stay at the same room,i really love that room,so agreed with him.the room is clean,full of Buddhist decor,beautiful,the dining room is big,cozy and it has a kitchen.but i was busy during the stay,no chance to use it.i only used the fridge inside the room.the room is comfortable, especially the bed,i had good sleeps here.the bathroom not big,but clean,the water pressure is strong,easy to use.though i never used hot water,but i did open it once,and it was hot.Tam,the host provided free mineral water everyday. every time when i returned,he will prepare juice and tea for me,he is very generous and nice.there are many options for the breakfast,i tried Hue veggies noodle soup,sautéd noodles with eggs and omelette with banh mi.all come with fruit salad,about the drinks,i tried passion fruits juice,black cofee with ice and ginger tea.all were delicious and healthy.i love sautéd noodles with eggs,it is called mi xao trung in vietnamese.on the third day.i ordered a private car with the host,visit three tombs and a museum at very reasonable price.on the last day,i booked a minibus to Hoi An from the host.Tam homestay though not a five star hotel,the host provide five star service,highly recommended!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen

The restaurant they suggested us was the best one Madam Thu.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công (2 Người Lớn + 1 Trẻ Em)

đi du lịch rất nhiều nơi rồi mà lần đầu tiên đến Huế lại book được home đúng nghĩa là “nhà” luôn. không điều gì là không dễ thương hết. phòng siêu sạch mang tất trắng từ lầu 1 lên lầu 3 mà vẫn trắng tinh. anh chủ biết lần đầu đến Huế thì hướng dẫn đi chơi đi ăn nhiệt tình dù chỉ ở 1 ngày thôi. xe máy thuê thì mới cóng luôn nhé. 
Sẽ trở lại Huế và sẽ book tiếp. 1000 * nha

review.comment_positive: Das Zimmer ist wirklich sehr groß, schön eingerichtet und sauber. Die Lage ist gut und der Gastgeber sehr freundlich. Meinem Freund ging es nicht gut und er hat Ingwertee zubereitet und sich sehr gesorgt.

review.comment_positive: Ottima struttura in un quartiere vivace di Huè. Il padrone di casa e la sua famiglia sono stati meravigliosi. Ci hanno accolto con tè vietnamita e spuntino di frutta, ci hanno aiutato ad organizzare il transfer a Da Nang, il figlio del proprietario ha addirittura provato ad aiutarci con un problema tecnico avuto con la nostra videocamera. La camera è piccolina ma pulita ed accogliente. Ricorderemo sempre questo posto per averci fatto sentire a casa anche dall'altra parte del mondo. Consigliatissimo!

I liked simply everything! the hostel is smack in the center of Hue, I got to rent the owners motorbike to get around (highly recommend!!) to really discover the city on my own. 
now to the place itself, everything’s so well thought through and beautiful that I was genuinely surprised. there’s every amenity in the room you could wish for, the hosts have brought me fresh tea or fruit every now and then and were super helpful with recommendations. 
when I got in the room, there were little flowers everywhere which was such a cute and heartfelt welcome that I felt right at home. Wi-Fi was great as well and I was just all around happy and satisfied.

La chambre et la salle de bain étaient très propres, fidèles au photos et décorées avec goût. Très bonne literie !
Idéalement placé dans une rue calme qui permet de se reposer paisiblement, mais à proximité du quartier vivant d'Hué.

Si je reviens à Hué, je sais où dormir ! Merci encore !

review.comment_positive: Находится в самом центре, рядом кафе, магазинчики и старый город. В номере очень чисто, кровать большая и удобная, в душе все чисто.
review.comment_negative: Снимали самый простой номер и он оказывается без окна. Я не увидела этого в описании. Хозяин на входе попросил разуться ( что нормально, как и везде во вьетнаме) и оставить обувь и дождевики внизу, был сильный дождь и всё было очень мокрое. Я спросила про сушку для обуви, он сказал что поставит под вентилятор и всё будет ок… По итогу на следующий день пришлось ехать в мокрых насквозь кроссовках и мокрых с двух сторон дождевиках( не знаю куда он их положил, но будто бы на улице висели).

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
sehr sauberes, schön eingerichtetes Appartement, eingerichtet mit allem was man benötigt.
Die schönste Unterkunft unserer kompletten Vietnam Rundreise.
Wir hätten dort noch länger bleiben können.
Sehr aufmerksamer Gastgeber, mit perfektem Service.
Viele nette Aufmerksamkeiten, bei der Ankunft zb. deutschsprachiger auf dem Tisch die Badelatschen standen immer so da man nur noch reinschlüpfen musste, geschnittenes Obst zur Frühstück, immer eine Tasse Tee zur Begrüßung, Zeit für einen Plausch etc.
Am Wochenende wird die "Einkaufstraße" für Roller gesperrt und zur Walking Street.
Alle Sehenswürdigkeiten sind fußläufig erreichbar.
Wir können die Unterkunft wirklich uneingeschränkt weiterempfehlen und werden bei unserer nächsten Reise nach Vietnam wieder dort übernachten.
review.comment_negative: Für uns war wirkliche alles Perfekt.

review.comment_positive: Tam Homestay exceeded our expectations with their accommodation and hospitality. Tam & his family are welcoming and friendly, they were always willing to help and this homestay made our visit to Hue memorable. Breakfast every morning was great, and light refreshments were provided every time we came back from our day adventures. Tam has set the bar for us while we continue our travels, no accommodation has beaten his standards and hospitality. We will definitely return to this place when we travel to Vietnam again and I would recommend Tam Homestay to anyone traveling to Hue because the location is great - only a few steps away from the central walking street!

We will return there for sure.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công (2 Người Lớn + 1 Trẻ Em)

review.rating: Amazing value for money and everything you could want in a very accommodating homestay
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe (2 Người lớn + 1 Trẻ em)
review.comment_positive: Tâm and his family are very accommodating hosts. Facilities were good, comfortable bed, A/C etc. Lovely home cooked breakfast with multiple options to select something different each day which was a real treat especially at the price point! Tâm even went above and beyond making us a takeaway breakfast on our last morning as we had an early check out! You are offered cold tea every time you arrive back at the homestay and occasionally offered fruit too which is a nice touch. As some other reviews have noted, there is such a thing as too much tea but the offer is very kind nonetheless and good to keep us hydrated in the heat. Would definitely recommend Tâm Homestay! 10/10

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công (2 Người Lớn + 1 Trẻ Em)
review.comment_positive: Great location right on the walking street. Family was very sweet and welcoming. They helped organise a tour to visit the imperial city. The room is very pretty and looks exactly like the pictures. Everything is very clean. Room is spacious.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe (2 Người lớn + 1 Trẻ em)

review.rating: We had such a lovely stay at Tam Homestay, the owner is so kind & the rooms are 1st class. highly recommended
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: this place is amazing!! You are literally in the heart of Hue but this place is like a sanctuary!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Super friendly and helpful staff!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe (2 Người lớn + 1 Trẻ em)
review.comment_positive: Lovely family to help us settle in. Delicious breakfast and beautiful clean facilities. They helped us to rent a scooter and also kept our luggage safe for us during the day after check out

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: La struttura si trova in una posizione strategica del centro di Hue, è allo stesso tempo vicino a tanti ristoranti e locali ma in un punto tranquillo e silenzioso. Tutto è pulitissimo, la stanza era grande e comoda. La colazione era molto buona. Il proprietario accoglie sempre gli ospiti con una tazza di thè. Ci ha dato indicazioni e consigli molto utili su dove andare e come muoverci dato il poco tempo che avevamo a disposizione. Ci ha organizzato il trasporto dall’aeroporto ad un prezzo molto ragionevole e ci ha affittato il motorino. Siccome pioveva ci ha anche prestato l’impermeabile. Ci ha anche permesso il check in veramente presto appena siamo arrivati. Consiglio a tutti di stare qui durante il vostro soggiorno a Hue.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công

review.rating: My 2-night stay is Tam Homestay is perfect. The atmosphere, the room, and the host service is beyond expectations.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Good and quite location, close to everything you need. The room is big, cozy, and clean, there are a tea corner and kitchen in the room. The host warmly welcomed me as a family member🥰

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe (2 Người lớn + 1 Trẻ em)
review.comment_positive: Uno dei migliori posti in cui ho alloggiato nelle 2 settimane in Vietnam. Posizione ottima, pulizia ma soprattutto la gentilezza di Tam mi ha fatto amare questa Homestay. Sempre sorridente, attento e premuroso, ogni volta che entravamo ci offriva the freddo e frutta, ci ha organizzato tour in città e transfer per Hoi An con soste turistiche veramente molto bello, ben organizzato e molto più economico di altri. Anche i suoi consigli di ristoranti e spa sono stati eccellenti.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Sạch sẽ chu đáo nhiệt tình, đã ở lần thứ hai và sẽ quay lại

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: A beautiful room in the center of the city. There is a lot of attention to detail in the design of the room. There is even a small kitchen, should you need it. The host is very friendly, and is always there when you need something. He made the arrangements to book a motorcycle for us and gave us free bottles of water when we left. There is always food and drinks ready for you when you come back to the homestay.
review.comment_negative: The room is in the center of the city, so it can be a little noisy. It's not that bad, but if you're a light sleeper that's something to keep in mind. Although the host is very friendly, sometimes it's a little bit too friendly. It can be a bit awkward if you just want to go to your room because you're tired, and he keeps offering you drinks and conversation. But that's a personal preference.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: the room had everything we needed. The staff were super friendly and accommodated us well.

review.comment_positive: Amazing place! Lovely room and decorated beautifully. The owner was so kind and was very helpful - sorting us a second night nearby when he had no more room. Looked after us very well. Great location but nicely down a side street so very quiet

review.rating: A lovely stay in the centre of Hue

- hospitality and helpfulness from the host! Also very friendly, served us a lot of tea whenever we returned and gave us good tips on what to see, where to eat, and what transports to get to our next destination. The room was good and the bed was ok.
Also, the place was close to the main attraction - imperial city of Hue.
The breakfast included was also very good!

review.comment_positive: Heel mooie homestay met super vriendelijke host. Ligt in een rustige straat en toch heel kort bij het centrum van Hue. Hebben hier goed geslapen en lekker ontbijt gehad. Host is ook heel vriendelijk en behulpzaam

review.rating: The absolute best homestay in our entire Vietnam trip
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công (2 Người Lớn + 1 Trẻ Em)
review.comment_positive:
The kindness and hospitality of the home owner are second to none. Our stay was really among the best we had not only in our Vietnam trip, but in all of our trips. 
The rooms are really beautiful and immaculately clean, breakfast is delicious, the location is perfect and as mentioned the service is outstanding. We felt at home and really cared for. Book early because it obviously sells out fast and you wouldn't want to miss it!!!

Es ist alles top sauber, das Frühstück lecker und frisch zubereitet, einfach perfekt. Die Lage ist spitze, direkt um die Ecke sind Restaurants/ Bars/ Supermarkt und Tams Empfehlungen waren top! 
Absolute Empfehlung! Wir würden jederzeit wieder kommen, eine herzliche Familie!

review.comment_positive: The family were very friendly, welcoming and helpful with local recommendations for food, taxis and even booked our transport/tour out of Hue to Hoi An last minute. The room was very comfortable and clean, and the included breakfast was very nice

review.comment_positive: La vera ricchezza di questo posto, carino ed accogliente, è il proprietario: estremamente cortese e disponibile, ha trovato rapidamente le soluzioni alle nostre necessità ( ad esempio il limousine bus da hoi an ad hue). review.rating: La mejor elección calidad-precio de todo Vietnam
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Absolutamente excelente. La família es un encanto, son muy serviciales, habitaciones muy confortables y limpías. Alquílan bicicletas a muy buen precio y ofrecen desayuno con la habitación. Sin duda, repetiría sin dudarlo en ningún caso

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Great place and family. Very clean and quiet. Very recommended.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công (2 Người Lớn + 1 Trẻ Em)
review.comment_positive:
When it comes to memorable getaways, my recent stay at the hotel exceeded all expectations and left an indelible mark on my heart. From the moment I stepped through the grand entrance, I was met with a level of hospitality that instantly put me at ease.

The first thing that struck me was the hotel's immaculate ambiance. The lobby was beautifully adorned, showcasing a perfect blend of modern aesthetics and classic charm. The staff welcomed me with warm smiles and a genuine eagerness to assist, setting the tone for the entire stay.

I was greeted by a scene of absolute comfort and elegance upon entering my room. I booked one room with one bed, but instead, the owner gave me a bigger room with very big comfortable beds.  We stayed there only for two nights. On our last day, we needed to check out from the room in the morning but were allowed to stay in the backyard of the hotel and use the pool until the evening because we had a train at that time.
I had a free lesson on how to drive the motorbike provided by I suppose one of the owners of the hotel, for which I was very thankful. 

What truly set this hotel apart was its exceptional service. The staff's dedication to ensuring my stay was nothing short of perfect was evident throughout my visit.  
I will recommend this place always for staying.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Everything is top notch. Room and bathroom amenities are more than I expected. I use their laundry services, the results are very clean, neat and fragrant in just a matter of hours. I also rented their scooters at affordable prices, and the host even provided a raincoat. The host was friendly and helpful. When I arrived, they welcoming me with hot tea and sliced fruit. When I checked out, his son helped me carry my bag while holding an umbrella so I wouldn't get caught in the rain, out of the homestay alley to catch my Grab Car.

Super helpful, attentive and responsive. I appreciated all the refreshing drinks that were offered whenever I came back from an outing. So very thoughtful! Immaculately clean rooms and beautifully decorated. Great location, and value for money. Best homestay in Hue! Highly recommended.

Les chambres sont grandes, propres et modernes, Le propriétaire très souriant et accueillant. Le petit déjeuner est bon et cuisiné tous les matins....Rien a redire !

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The owner is very friendly and makes sure the customers have everything they need. Every time you come home, there is tea waiting for you. The rooms are super clean. Overall we are super happy with the place. Thank you!!

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công (2 Người Lớn + 1 Trẻ Em)
review.comment_positive: Потрясающий homestay. Оригинальный дизайн, сделано все очень красиво. Нам досталась комната с большим балконом и отличным видом. Комната очень чистая и просторная. Хороший душ. Расположение в самом центре, рядом с атмосферными кафе и прогулочной улицей. Отличный хозяин, приветливый, добродушный. Дал нам карту со всеми достопримечательностями абсолютно бесплатно. Брали трансфер от отеля из аэропорта по очень хорошей цене. Рекомендую!!! Стоимость за это место очень низкая))))

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Très bon accueil, toujours prêt à rendre service et à donner des conseils. L'hôtel est bien situé, les chambres sont spacieuses, propres et bien équipées. Petit déjeuner copieux et bon. Tout était parfait :)

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe (2 Người lớn + 1 Trẻ em)
review.comment_positive: Everything was great. The host was friendly and very thoughtful. I really felt welcomed and didn't have to worry about anything (from the room cleanliness and amenities, as well as how to get around).
review.comment_negative: There were mosquitoes in the room (but not many).

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Les propriétaires sont adorables et aux petits soins. L’hôtel est très bien situé et les chambres sont très confortables.
review.comment_negative: Rien à ajouter! Tout était parfait

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
Phòng Superior Giường Đôi
review.comment_positive: Phòng có điều hòa, tuy nhiên hơi cũ nhưng vẫn dùng được.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Homestay muy acogedor. Es pequeño, pero lo suficiente como para estar cómodo. La habitación tiene un tamaño suficiente. Nos ayudaron con el transporte a Hoi An. Alquilan motocicletas. Comunicación a través de Booking muy fluida con el alojamiento. El desayuno incluido en la media de lo ofrecido en otros homestay de Vietnam, café, tortilla y fruta. El anfitrión muy amable y atento, te obsequia con té caliente o frío. Nosotros llegamos a las 8am, y además de té nos dio fruta y dos bollitos, así como posibilidad de ducharnos al no estar disponible aún la habitación.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
Die Unterkunft war liebevoll und schön eingerichtet. Das Zimmer war sehr sauber, besonders gut fanden wir die Duschkabine, die in anderen Unterkünften in Vietnam häufig fehlt. Die Gastgeberfamilie ist sehr freundlich und es gibt den ganzen Tag über kostenlosen Tee. Auch das Frühstück war sehr lecker. 
Über die Mitarbeiter kann man auch Touren, Bustickets etc. buchen, was wunderbar funktioniert hat. 
Die Lage der Unterkunft ist top, Cafes und Restaurants sind fußläufig erreichbar. Wir haben uns hier sehr wohl gefühlt und würden wieder hier übernachten.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The owner was very kind and friendly. He helped us to book a transfer for Hoi An. He offered us such a lot o thinks, the, fruits…

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe (2 Người lớn + 1 Trẻ em)
review.comment_positive:
Tam and his family were so friendly, kind and helped with anything you needed. The breakfast was delicious and the room was clean with everything you needed. Laundry was very reasonable with a very quick turn around. 
Thank you so so much!!

review.rating: Lovely spot with very friendly staff.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Really lovely family run place, the staff couldn't have done more to accommodate us and help with any questions we had. They also included breakfast and lots of free tea. We arrived prior to check in and they let us check in early which was great after a long night bus. The location was great as you can walk to the citadel easily and lots of bars and restaurants - we are at Madame Thur on their recommendation and it was probably the best meal we had in Vietnam! Would have stayed another night if we could.
review.comment_negative: For some reason although really clean, our room was actually a little damp which made the bed and our belongings feel a bit wet - we should have mentioned to them and switched rooms though.

review.rating: Tuyệt. Khi nào ghé Huế mình sẽ ở đây tiếp.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Cả gia đình anh chị chủ nhà siêu dễ thương và nhiệt tình, phòng sạch sẽ, tươi mát, an yên.

review.rating: 1 nuit chez Tam, je vous conseille d'en faire plusieurs! !
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Ça ne peut pas être mieux, on a fait de nombreux homestay durant notre séjour au Vietnam, la plupart excellents, celui ci était simplement parfait, Tam est au petit soin, l'endroit est top, le service parfait. Franchement, bravo !!
review.comment_negative: On a cherché et en fait bein on n'a rien trouvé, c'était parfait

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công (2 Người Lớn + 1 Trẻ Em)
review.comment_positive: Persoonlijke aandacht, zeer vriendelijk. Heerlijk ontbijt.

review.rating: Lovely place to stay in Hue!
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Rooms were very clean and spacious. Location is great, right in the centre of the south part of the city. Loads of nice restaurants and bars within 3 minutes walk, and you can also walk to the Imperial City from the hotel. The owner and his wife are very friendly and always looking to help. He will offer you tea and fruit each time you come back to the hotel which is very nice. Breakfast is included and is nice as well.
review.comment_negative: Make sure to take valuables with you or lock them up when leaving the room. We had a situation where a small amount of money had gone missing whilst we were at breakfast. We did inform the owner and he was concerned and respectful about the issue but did not know who would have taken it, so I would advise to keep valuables locked away or on you as there isn’t a safe in the room to store them. Apart from this incident everything else was perfect.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi
review.comment_positive: So với giá thì không tệ lắm. Sạch sẽ ở mức có thể chấp nhận được.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
Bữa sáng khá ngon.
Địa điểm nằm gần siêu thị, kinh thành huế cũng như các địa điểm khác nên tiện di chuyển.
review.comment_negative: Có thể cải thiện phòng kín hơn chút.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe (2 Người lớn + 1 Trẻ em)
review.comment_positive:
Servicen var over alt forventning! 
gør jer selv en tjeneste og tage en overnatning her. Værterne er så skønne, de sørger for at alle dine ønsker bliver opfyldt! 10/10

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Wij zijn hier maar 1 nacht gebleven maar de eigenaar stond de hele tijd voor ons klaar. We hebben gratis zijn scooter mogen lenen. Daarnaast heeft hij voor ons easy riders geregeld die ons maar hoi an hebben gebracht met erg mooie tussenstops.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
Chuong ci ha accolto come membri della famiglia.
Sempre gentile.
Ci ha organizzato le varie escursioni con prezzi super competitivi.
Colazione ottima.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
Die Hosts waren so freundlich und hilfsbereit! Sie haben uns den Bus gebucht und uns bei extremen Hochwasser zum Bus begleitet. 
Die Unterkunft ist sehr schön dekoriert und es gibt kostenloses Frühstück und Tee! Wirklich zu empfehlen.
review.comment_negative: Kein Fenster nach draußen (aber nicht bei allen Zimmern)

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
Very clean and comfortable.
The family are very kind and helpful.
Breakfast was excellent.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Leider kann ich dazu nichts sagen da wir nicht dort geschlafen haben sondern in Eigenregie umgebucht wurden vom Hotel
review.comment_negative: Uns wurde kurz vor Check In mitgeteilt, dass sie ein Problem mit dem Bad haben und wir kein Zimmer mehr bekommen können. Der Besitzer buchte uns einfach ein Zimmer im Hotel gleich neben an. Leider war es wirklich nicht gut und überhaupt nicht das was wir wollten. Er hat uns ein Nachlass gegeben aber wenn wir eine billige Unterkunft gewollt hätten, hätten wir sie selber gebucht. Leider sehr schade, da das Hotel echt gut ausgesehen hat.

review.rating: Charmant homestay confortable, économique et hôte adorable
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: L’emplacement, la gentillesse du personnel, le petit déjeuner, le rapport qualité prix

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi
review.comment_positive: Phòng có những vật dụng cơ bản. Tạm được.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công (2 Người Lớn + 1 Trẻ Em)
review.comment_positive:
Room was beautiful, furnitured with great taste and veery clean!
Excellent value for price! 
Host offers refreshments such as fruits and hot beverages 🥰
Probably best stay in Vietnam which I had a pleasure to experienced! 11/10 !

review.rating: Great choice for a one night stay in Hue!
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The family running the homestay was super nice and helpful, they explained us everything we could see in town. When we left they also gave us some snacks for our trip, which was so kind of them
review.comment_negative: Breakfast could be improved but overall they did everything they could to meet our dietary needs so it's a thumbs up for us

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi
review.comment_positive: Nhân viên làm việc theo quy trình. Phòng ở mức cũng được.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe (2 Người lớn + 1 Trẻ em)

review.rating: Sehr empfehlenswert für eine Reise nach Hue!
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe (2 Người lớn + 1 Trẻ em)
review.comment_positive: Sehr zentral und gleichzeitig ruhig. Sehr netter und zuvorkommender Gastgeber. Individuelle Frühstücksoptionen.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Отличное расположение, в самом центре, 2-х комнатный номер в изысканном вьетнамском стиле с бамбуковой мебелью, шикарными светильниками, белоснежной постелью и балконом с плетенной мебелью. Безграничное радушие хозяина этого милого жилища, наполненного заботой и умением понимать и осуществлять все нужды туристов! Заказали здесь трансфер в Дананг, хозяин показал нам на карте места в Хюе, как до них добраться, посоветовал кафе с очень вкусной местной едой. Очень рекомендую отель, вы будете в восторге!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe (2 Người lớn + 1 Trẻ em)
review.comment_positive: We had one night here and it was perfect. They let us check in early after a long journey on a night bus and they were very accommodating. I would definitely recommend staying here.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: La atención y amabilidad del personal, siempre atentos y con una sonrisa. También la ubicación (en plena calle céntrica y peatonal, pero en una callejuela por lo que no había nada de ruido). Realmente inmejorable la ubicación.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Mùi hương dễ chịu, host nhiệt tình, nội thất đẹp

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: So welcoming and friendly fantastic place lives up to its rating

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: El mejor hotel de la ciudad sin duda. Te harán sentir como de la familia. Buena ubicación, limpio, te ayudan con todo... Además no paran de tener detalles en cada momento. Gracias Tam!!

review.rating: Brilliant stay at Tam’s homestay. Value for money is unbeatable!
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
Fantastic customer service: very responsive on the Booking app, we had a welcome drink & snack on arrival, our bags were immediately taken to our room and Tam was more than happy to help booking buses/ motorbikes/ laundry etc.

Room is lovely. Cosy, clean & modern.

Great value for money!
review.comment_negative: Nothing (perhaps the pancakes for breakfast could contain less oil /butter)

review.room_type: Căn Hộ Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: It was a home away from home. Great location in amonst it. We only stayed one night and still we were kindly welcomed and were offered services which massively increased our experience in Hue and allowed us to easily see everything we wanted to. The little touches make a big difference. Even the follow up after the trip to Hoi An. The stay was beyond our expectations.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: El dueño era ma-jí-si-mo, cada vez que venía de hacer alguna excursión me tenía preparado té y fruta, te recomendaba sitios, te decía si estabas a gusto siempre, el desayuno estuvo rico (elegí pancakes con miel y un café), incluso me alquiló una bici bastante nueva.
review.comment_negative: Lo único que podía incomodar un poco (porque quizá en nuestra cultura no es así o en mi caso) es que notabas que el dueño entraba a la habitación a poner de nuevo florecitas y cambiarte toallas cada día. Normalmente estoy acostumbrada a poner un cartel cuando quiero que limpien o renueven toallas, pero aún así todo bien, es por decir algo.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi
review.comment_positive: Trải nghiệm ở mức tạm được, không có gì nổi bật.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Erinomainen asiakaspalvelu

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công (2 Người Lớn + 1 Trẻ Em)
Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Everything about this property from the host to the room to the breakfast was wonderful.  I felt very welcome and was pleasantly surprised by the large size of the room.  This would be a great place for a long term stay.
review.comment_negative: The owner arranged for transport from the property to Da Nang.  Even though it was more expensive than something that I could have set up, I thought this would be a better option.  However, instead of dropping me off at my hotel in Da Nang as promised, I was left at the side of a busy road over 2 miles away.  So, I had to walk at night.  Not ideal.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe (2 Người lớn + 1 Trẻ em)
review.comment_positive: Établissement très propre, les propriétaires sont très attentionnés, chauffeur pour l’aéroport, location de scooter. Dès notre arrivée il nous a donné un plan avec tout ce qu’il y a dans les environs. Petit déjeuner très copieux.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công (2 Người Lớn + 1 Trẻ Em)
review.comment_positive:
Todo.
La suit dispone de todo lo necesario para pasar varios días en el alojamiento. Está limpia, bien distribuída, es cómoda y confortable.
La relación calidad/precio inmejorable.
El personal es hospitalario y muy amable.
Olvidé mis zapatillas de senderismo en el Homestay, me di cuenta días más tarde, contacte con ellos y sin dudarlo se ofrecieron a enviármelas al hotel de Hanoi donde nos hospedaríamos en unos días. Me mantuvieron al corriente del trámite en todo momento, se encargaron de todo, no tuve que preocuparme en ningún momento. Les estoy muy agradecida.
Es muy agradable encontrar un sitio como esté cuando estás de viaje. Les deseo lo mejor a nuestros amigos del Tâm Homestay.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
Phòng Deluxe (2 Người lớn + 1 Trẻ em)
review.comment_positive: Die Gastfreundlichkeit war phänomenal! Die Abholung vom Flughafen, die Begrüßung,  das Zimmer, die Lage -- perfekt! Weiter so!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: El dueño del hotel es muy amable y siempre que llegas te recibe con un té de cortesía. Todo está cuidado con mucho detalle y está muy limpio. Está en medio de la zona de tiendas, bares y restaurantes pero escondido en una callejuela por lo que es muy tranquilo
review.comment_negative: Cuando nos íbamos nos enteramos que no se podía pagar con tarjeta y ya lo habíamos calculado así ya que nos quedaba poco dinero en moneda local, por lo que al final nos dio como solución pagar una parte en € para no quedarnos sin nada.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công

review.comment_positive: เจ้าของใจดีมาก บริการดี ที่พักสะอาด ห้องสวยถูกใจ ถ้ามีโอกาสได้มาอีกฉันจะมาพักที่นี่อีกแน่นอน❤️❤️

review.rating: Lần thứ n mình đến đây và cảm giác như ở nhà - rất an yên và thoải mái. cảm ơn cô chú chủ nhà rất tuyệt vời ạ .

review.comment_positive: Phòng sạch sẽ, ngay trung tâm, cô chú chủ homestay siêu dễ mến

review.rating: Wohl und gut aufgehoben - klare Empfehlung!

review.rating: Các bạn có đến Huế chơi, rất nên trải nghiệm Tâm Homestay, bạn sẽ có được giấc ngủ ngon, an lành sau 1 ngày rong chơi! C
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
- anh chị chủ rất nhiệt tình, thân thiện, cảm giác như ở nhà. đi mưa về là anh/chị làm ngay cho ly trà gừng uống ấm bụng 😍
- phòng rất sạch, decor nhẹ nhàng, thanh thoát, có nhiều sách hay để đọc
- homestay ở ngay phố Tây, khuất sau 1 con hẻm ngắn nên không ồn ào, rất tiện để đi tham quan các nơi ở Huế, xung quanh thì có rất nhiều quán ăn

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen

review.comment_positive: La stanza era pulitissima e molto confortevole. Gentilezza e cortesia da parte dei gestori.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công (2 Người Lớn + 1 Trẻ Em)
review.comment_positive: Super nice family and helpful! Kept our bags the whole day while visiting and waited for our dinner before getting the train. Did nice cloths cleaning. Super central location.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Lovely home stay tucked away from the walking busy street. Amazing location. Mr Tam was wonderful and welcoming, accommodating all of our needs. We rented a great scooter from him for only 100k per day. Breakfast was great.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: La atención de los anfitriones

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Rundum perfekt. Unschlagbares Preis-Leistungsverhältnis. bisher die sauberste Unterkunft auf unserer Reise durch Vietnam. Sehr freundliche und aufmerksame Gastgeber - wurden mit Obst und Tee empfangen, haben Wasserflaschen mehrmals bekommen bei > 35 Grad Außentemperatur und auch beim Frühstück fehlte es an nichts. Durch den Gastgeber wurde uns eine fantastische Motorradtagestour über den Hai Van Pass mit mehreren weiteren Stopps zu einem sehr guten Preis organisiert, verglichen mit kommerziell erhältlichen Touren.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Tutto ottimo. Accoglienza meravigliosa e assistenza a 360 gradi (noleggio scooter, prenotazione autobus, consigli). La camera che abbiamo scelto era veramente bella e fornita di ogni confort, peccato solo che le tende non fossero oscuranti. La posizione dell'homestay è molto comoda e centrale ma consiglio comunque il noleggio di uno scooter o bicicletta per spostarsi in quanto le attrazioni di Hue sono molto distanti tra loro.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công (2 Người Lớn + 1 Trẻ Em)

review.comment_positive: Der Besitzer ist sehr zuvorkommend und die ganze Familie ist sehr freundlich. Die Zimmer sind sehr schön und der Balkon ist ein echtes Schmuckstück.u

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công (2 Người Lớn + 1 Trẻ Em)
review.comment_positive: Wer nach Hué kommt, sollte bei Tam's Homestay einchecken. Das Zimmer war fantastisch, die Lage SUPER zentral, alles war sauber und das Personal mehr als zuvorkommend und freundlich. Wir haben uns hier sehr wohl gefühlt und empfehlen jedem, hier vorbeizukommen!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe (2 Người lớn + 1 Trẻ em)
review.comment_positive: Tutto bene

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Room was very clean, great location, right by the walking street, host was very accommodating, he will go a distance to make your stay comfortable as possible. Very satisfied with our stay. Highly recommended

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
Das Homestay ist super zentral aber in einer ruhigen Seitenstraße gelegen (an der man beim ersten Mal schnell vorbeilaufen kann). 
Besonders herausheben möchten wir die Gastgeber. Wir haben noch nie auf unseren Reisen so unglaublich nette Menschen kennen gelernt! Mr Tam hat mir z.B. mit viel Tee, Obst und japanischem Heilkräuteröl durch meine Erkältung geholfen und mich sogar zum Bus gefahren weil ich so erschöpft war. Wir hatten am Ende wirklich das Gefühl, in die Familie aufgenommen worden zu sein.
Das ganze Homestay war immer blitzblank, die Zimmer würden täglich gereinigt und sehen genauso aus wie auf den Bildern.
Wir hatten über Mr Tam für einen Tag einen Roller gemietet, auch das hat problemlos funktioniert. Auch die empfohlenen Restaurants waren durchweg sehr lecker.
Wir können jedem nur ans Herz legen Tam Homestay zu besuchen.
review.comment_negative: nichts, es war wirklich alles super!

review.rating: Un homestay d'une grande qualité, bénéficiant d'un emplacement idéal pour visiter la ville
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe (2 Người lớn + 1 Trẻ em)
review.comment_positive:
-Le homestay et les chambres sont très propres et magnifiquement décorés.
-L'emplacement du homestay est exceptionnel ! Il est situé dans une ruelle calme, à l'écart des bruits de la ville, mais tout près de tous les meilleurs restaurants et bars. 
-Le fait de pouvoir choisir notre petit-déjeuner la veille. L'hôte vous présente une carte avec plusieurs choix. 
-L'hôte (Chuong) est chaleureux, accueillant, hyper sympathique et toujours prêt à aider.
review.comment_negative: -Je ne pensais jamais écrire cela un jour, mais l'hôte était un peu trop "présent". Je m'explique: sans rien enlever à la qualité de son accueil, nous aurions aimé pouvoir entrer et sortir du homestay sans avoir à lui faire part de nos plans pour la journée. Nous avions l'impression de devoir nous justifier (pourquoi nous sortons, pourquoi nous nous levons aussi tard, etc.)

review.rating: Homestay ấm áp như gia đình
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Tới Huế hơi muộn vào hơn 21h tối nhưng chủ nhà đã chờ sẵn và chào đón bằng một ly nước mát rồi ạ. Phòng rất đẹp và thực sự sạch sẽ, home dọn phòng mỗi ngày. Trong phòng có bàn đọc sách và rất nhiều sách cùng một ban công thoáng với nhiều cây xanh để ngồi thư giãn. Nước uống và cà phê gói free còn nước trong tủ lạnh sẽ tính phí. 

Nhà nằm trong phố đi bộ Chu Văn An nên buổi tối thứ 6 đến chủ nhật có thể ra ngoài đi bộ ngắm người qua lại. Tuy bên ngoài là phố đi bộ nhưng về bên trong nhà thì sẽ không bị ồn đâu nha. 

Trong nhà tắm có tất cả các đồ dùng cần thiết và sạch một cách bất ngờ, khi mới nhận phòng trên giường và trong phòng tắm sẽ có mấy bông hoa nhỏ xinh nữa.

Nhà có hỗ trợ thuê xe máy (xe máy mới tinh chứ không phải xe cũ như những chỗ khác đâu) và cả taxi đưa đón sân bay nữa.

Gia đình anh chị chủ nhà hiếu khách và nhiệt tình lắm, cảm giác như đang ở nhà mình vậy. Lần tới nếu có cơ hội sẽ quay lại lưu trú. Nhất định em sẽ giới thiệu nhà mình với bạn bè có dự định đi du lịch ở Huế ạ ❤

review.rating: The perfect place to stay in Hué
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
The location is fantastic, it is in town but not close to the busy streets or noise, so perfect for relaxing in Hué. The rooms are big, nice and comfortable, every detail of the room is very special and the owners have surely thought deeply of the best way to decorate the rooms to make you feel at home. You can really see the love and care that they put into the room. Everything is made out of bamboo, and it really gives a relaxing scene that makes all the difference.

Although we had little time in Hue, the owners were incredibly nice and helpful in our trip, recommending for us both the sightseeing to do during our stay and arranging for us the booking for the bus to our next destination. They also arranged for us the rent of a motorbike. You can feel in their smiles that they welcome guests wholeheartedly.

I strongly recommend that you look no further and stay at Tam Homestay.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe (2 Người lớn + 1 Trẻ em)
review.comment_positive:
Đợt mình ra Huế đúng ngày bão áp thấp nhiệt đới, nay phải thay đổi ngày ở và về luôn trong ngày. 

Chú chủ nhà rất nhiệt tình, hướng dẫn tụi mình chỗ đi ăn và đi chơi. Phòng nhận rất sạch sẽ, gọn gàng và vibes ấm cúng. Trong phòng có thêm vài cuốn sách để khách nằm chill. Giường là dạng đóng khung bằng gỗ tre/trúc to. 

Nói chung là, không có gì để chê, do nhà chú là homestay nên không có thang máy thoi.

Mình sẽ đợi mùa đẹp và quay lại book chỗ này lần nữaaaaa

review.comment_positive: Nós tivemos uma recepção muito calorosa. O hotel fez contato conosco antes da hospedagem para deixar tudo pronto. O tempo todo nos serviam chá ou suco gelado, bem como frutas. Reservamos dois quartos, sendo que um deles possuía uma sala, sacada e cozinha. Os quartos eram limpos, a cama era boa e o chuveiro ótimo. Quando chegamos, haviam pequenas flores sob a cama e toalhas. O café da manhã nos agradou também. O hotel também providenciou tours com preços mais baratos que as agências locais. Fica bem localizado, porém numa rua tranquila, sem barulho

review.comment_positive: La mejor experiencia de alojamiento en Vietnam. Súper limpio, habitación espaciosa, personal muy amable y sonriente (siempre nos recibía con té frío), desayuno muy rico, honestos en cuanto a precios esperados y esperables, y muy buen gusto en la decoración. Todo 10
