review.rating: A great stay in Hue with exceptional staff
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: We had an amazing stay! The Homestay is in a great location near many restaurants and bars but is tucked away so you don’t get any of the noise. The room was clean and updated. The owner was exceptionally kind and generous- we were always welcomed with a drink and fruit. He also arranged laundry services for us and bicycles.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Tam Homestay - Host was always welcoming, kind, friendly and helpful. Facilities were excellent and the room was spotless. Close to all local amenities and yet very quiet. The perfect homestay. Wish we could have stayed longer.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
We really enjoyed staying at the calming and beautifully decorated Tâm homestay!
The owner is super friendly, you can feel that he really enjoys helping and hosting people. We drank tea and enjoyed delicious fruit together. Thank you again!

review.rating: Absolutely perfect!! Couldn’t have asked for anything better. Made our stay in Hue 100000x better!
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe (2 Người lớn + 1 Trẻ em)
review.comment_positive: Absolutely the best stay in Hue! The hosts make you feel like you are at home, brining snacks and drinks whenever you return from a busy day of sightseeing. They help making plans (they organized everything for us - rented the bike, found a driver to take us where we needed to go, etc). The location is amazing, close to a nice central area full of restaurants. The rooms are beautiful, clean, and comfortable. They really thought of every detail to make this the perfect stay!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Clean and cosy room and a very helpful owner.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Très bon emplacement, la décoration de la chambre et son confort, le petit balcon, le calme.

review.rating: Perfekte Unterkunft für einen Besuch in Hue
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Es ist ein wirklich schönes und gemütliches Homestay. Das Zimmer war sehr groß und die Lage ist optimal. Wir haben uns von Anfang an sehr willkommen und gut aufgehoben gefühlt. Es ist sehr zu empfehlen!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen

review.comment_positive: Everything was great .. the family owned business took great care of us.. got us a scooter as well … room was perfect …Highly recommend

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi
review.comment_positive: Khách sạn là một lựa chọn tạm được cho nhóm cần chỗ ở cơ bản.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công (2 Người Lớn + 1 Trẻ Em)
review.comment_positive: One of the best places we’ve stayed in 5 months of travelling and might just have been the cheapest too. Such a lovely homestay with the nicest family there to welcome you every time you come back. The room was just amazing, so nicely decorated and had such a nice vibe to it - lovely balcony too. If you come to Hue you just simply have to stay here!
review.comment_negative: Nothing, was quite funny how the family hopped up every time we came back, they really care about their guests but sometimes they could just chill and not worry themselves too much aha.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công (2 Người Lớn + 1 Trẻ Em)
review.comment_positive: Zuallererst der Gastgeber, sie sind so herzlich und freundlich. Man wird schon so toll empfangen und sie sind während des gesamten Aufenthaltes freundlich, zuvorkommen und hilfsbereit. Sie haben uns alle Fragen beantwortet, sich die Zeit genommen, tolle Tipps gegeben. Die Gastfreundschaft & Herzlichkeit ist überwältigend. Die Unterkunft ist sehr schön eingerichtet und sehr sauber und man hat alles was man braucht. Man fühlt sich so wohl, wir wären gerne länger geblieben. Die Location ist super zentral aber ruhig. Vielen Dank an die Gastgeberfamilie!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: La ubicación del hotel, cerca de la zona de bares y restaurantes, pero en una calle muy tranquila (restaurante Zucca a 3min y muy recomendable). La amabilidad del personal.

review.comment_positive:
הבעלים של המקום מקסים ורק רוצה לעזור כל הזמן, דאג לנו לכל מה שהיינו צריכות והראה לנו במפה מיקומים חשובים. השהות הייתה מאוד נעימה ושלווה, המקום עצמו מעוצב במנימליסטיות נעימה ויפה והכל מאוד נקי
המיקום היה ממש על כל הרחובות הראשיים עם הברים והחנויות אבל בגלל שהוא בתוך סמטה היה מאוד שקט 
אחד המקומות עם התמורה הכי טובה למחיר שהייתי בו, לגמרי אמליץ לכל מי שמחפש להיות קרוב למרכז אבל עדיין להנות מהשקט והשלווה
